attributes.title: despicable app!!!
attributes.review: when i opened the app, i was met with a terrifying picture of the most grotesque man you could EVER imagine.🤢😭 i nearly fainted on sight. i have since deleted it. i never want anyone to experience this sorrow and woe. please take this app off the app store.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This app crashes exactly when you open it and glitches and plays music when you open it it a absolute abomination of a app and that’s probably because a orange created it 0/10 I don’t recommend using the app

attributes.title: Horrible app 🤢 👎
attributes.review: This app is horrible! It takes way to long to download and it sends way to many notifications a day it sends like 300 a day!!!! It also takes a lot of storage away from my phone!!!!!!!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD 🤬😤😡
attributes.review: trump tried hitting on my underage daughter through this app 😡he messaged her and asked for her number she is five❗️❗️❗️❗️when i initially downloaded this app white people came to my door and chanted trump trump trump 😰😰😰with their guns out and everything. it was the scariest thing ever. trump 2020 🇺🇸🇺🇸but on his grave 😡

attributes.title: Do not use this app
attributes.review: This app is the worst! Not only did it not work at all... it gave horrible info. They proceed to tell me that my pet rabbit coco was useless & illegal.💔 This app is one of the useless apps I’ve ever downloaded. My grandma Sharon almost had a heart attack with what the app said.

attributes.title: Absolutely garbage
attributes.review: When I opened the app it immediately crashed and then it asked for so much information that it was weird and too personal and there was no importantance to this app terrible and do not download

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: I got this app and suddenly my phone started shaking and flying around the room say it was going to grab my 🐱 please help. I am now pinning it down while it screams racial slurs. Someone help I can’t even call the cops because they won’t do anything 😭

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: IT TOOK ME DAYS!! for my app to download though i was so eager to be able to download an app that advocates for my president ❤️ and then even when the app was downloaded, it continued to crash every time :/. worst app ever, i don’t think i will be voting for trump after this. very bad.

attributes.title: WORST APP!!!!!
attributes.review: This app is the worst it is stupid it has brung spiders to my phone and has terrible service and has terrified me when I asked the spiders to stop they would not and began to wast my time and then the spider said they would kill the queen spider if I don’t listen to them

WORST APP EVER! This app made my phone crash and I had to buy s BRAND NEW PHONE! Later it hacked into my car system and made me crash. I almost died and had to go to the hospital. I had to pay millions of dollars in medical bills. I also had to buy a new car. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!! 🤬
